message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a little too high for me. Would you be willing to come down to $9,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I'm eager to find a fair deal, $9,000 is lower than I can go. Could you meet me halfway at $10,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $9,500?
